# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_library(codec-codegen-llvm14)


target_compile_options(codec-codegen-llvm14 PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_include_directories(codec-codegen-llvm14 PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yql/essentials/minikql/computation
)

target_include_directories(codec-codegen-llvm14 PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen
)

target_link_libraries(codec-codegen-llvm14 PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  minikql-codegen-llvm14
  library-cpp-resource
  essentials-types-binary_json
  parser-pg_wrapper-interface
  yql-essentials-utils
  yt-codec-codegen
  providers-yt-codec
)

target_sources(codec-codegen-llvm14 PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yt_codec_cg.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yt_codec_bc.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_computation_node_codegen.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_llvm_base.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_block_impl_codegen.h
)


copy_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/yt_codec_cg.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yt_codec_cg.cpp
)

copy_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/yt_codec_bc.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yt_codec_bc.cpp
)

copy_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_computation_node_codegen.h.txt
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_computation_node_codegen.h
)

copy_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_llvm_base.h.txt
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_llvm_base.h
)

copy_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_block_impl_codegen.h.txt
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yql/essentials/minikql/computation/mkql_block_impl_codegen.h
)

add_global_library_for(codec-codegen-llvm14.global
  codec-codegen-llvm14)


target_compile_options(codec-codegen-llvm14.global PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_include_directories(codec-codegen-llvm14.global PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yql/essentials/minikql/computation
)

target_include_directories(codec-codegen-llvm14.global PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen
)

target_link_libraries(codec-codegen-llvm14.global PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  minikql-codegen-llvm14
  library-cpp-resource
  essentials-types-binary_json
  parser-pg_wrapper-interface
  yql-essentials-utils
  yt-codec-codegen
  providers-yt-codec
)

target_sources(codec-codegen-llvm14.global PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/528fcf5b22d18d269ede95c1dba72cbb.cpp
)


add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/YtCodecFuncs_merged.14.bc
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt_codec_bc.cpp.14.bc
  COMMAND
  ${LLVMLINK}
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt_codec_bc.cpp.14.bc
  -o
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/YtCodecFuncs_merged.14.bc
)

add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/YtCodecFuncs_optimized.14.bc
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/YtCodecFuncs_merged.14.bc
  COMMAND
  ${LLVMOPT}
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/YtCodecFuncs_merged.14.bc
  -o
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/YtCodecFuncs_optimized.14.bc
  -internalize-public-api-list=WriteJust#WriteNothing#WriteBool#Write8#Write16#Write32#Write64#Write120#WriteDecimal32#WriteDecimal64#WriteDecimal128#WriteFloat#WriteDouble#WriteString#ReadBool#ReadInt8#ReadUint8#ReadInt16#ReadUint16#ReadInt32#ReadUint32#ReadInt64#ReadUint64#ReadInt120#ReadDecimal32#ReadDecimal64#ReadDecimal128#ReadFloat#ReadDouble#ReadOptional#ReadVariantData#SkipFixedData#SkipVarData#ReadTzDate#ReadTzDatetime#ReadTzTimestamp#ReadTzDate32#ReadTzDatetime64#ReadTzTimestamp64#WriteTzDate#WriteTzDatetime#WriteTzTimestamp#WriteTzDate32#WriteTzDatetime64#WriteTzTimestamp64#GetWrittenBytes#FillZero
  -passes="default<O2>,globalopt,globaldce,internalize"
)

llvm_compile_cxx(codec-codegen-llvm14.global
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/yt_codec_bc.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt_codec_bc.cpp.14.bc
  ${CLANGPLUSPLUS}
  -Wno-unknown-warning-option
  -emit-llvm
)

resources(codec-codegen-llvm14.global
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/528fcf5b22d18d269ede95c1dba72cbb.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yql/providers/yt/codec/codegen/llvm14/YtCodecFuncs_optimized.14.bc
  KEYS
  /llvm_bc/YtCodecFuncs
  OPTS
)
